sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_e9472ff497c62d50cca5fce3a253afb7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>kaogotchiServiceExample</name><script><![CDATA[function kaogotchiServiceExample() {
    //declare all the variables that we will need below
    var setting = 'main';
    var maxTotal = 1000;
    var maxSleep = maxTotal;
    var maxHunger = maxTotal;
    var maxPlay = maxTotal;
    var day = maxTotal * 0.05;
    var tamagotchi = {
        sleep: maxSleep,
        hunger: maxHunger,
        play: maxPlay
    };
    var sysId;
    var score = 0;
    var kaoName;

    //below are all the functions that we will return the values for when called
    return {
        //we have a value for 'day' centrally stored here, so it is easy to return the 'points' iterator
        addPoints: function() {
            return day / 100;
        },
        //returns the current gameplay object, see also: setTmgch
        getKao: function() {
            return tamagotchi;
        },
        //when sleeping, eating, and playing we need to update the object based on the 'day' value we have stored
        //we also use this as a chance to make sure that the values cannot go over the maximum
        actionSleep: function(tmgch) {
            tmgch.sleep += day;
            if (tmgch.sleep >= maxSleep) {
                tmgch.sleep = maxSleep;
            }
            return tmgch;
        },
        actionEat: function(tmgch) {
            tmgch.hunger += day;
            if (tmgch.hunger >= maxHunger) {
                tmgch.hunger = maxHunger;
            }
            return tmgch;
        },
        actionPlay: function(tmgch) {
            tmgch.play += day;
            if (tmgch.play >= maxPlay) {
                tmgch.play = maxPlay;
            }
            return tmgch;
        },
        //accepts the object for the saved state, stores it, and then returns it, see also: getKao
        setTmgch: function(restoreTmgch) {
            tamagotchi = restoreTmgch;
            return tamagotchi;
        },
        //set the difficulty level using the 'day' value to control how quickly you accumulate points
        setLevel: function(level) {
            if (level == "Hard") {
                this.setDay(maxTotal * 0.01); //calls the `setDay` function that is contained in this provider
            } else if (level == "Normal") { //(included as an example of how you can call other functions in the provider from within the provider)
                this.setDay(maxTotal * 0.05);
            } else if (level == "Easy") {
                this.setDay(maxTotal * 0.1);
            }
        },
        //accept a value and update the 'day' variable to that value
        //called by the setLevel function above
        setDay: function(dayVal) {
            day = dayVal;
        },
        //take the current raw values for Sleep, Hunger, and Play and return percentages
        getSleep: function(sleep) {
            return (sleep / maxSleep * 100).toFixed(2);
        },
        getHunger: function(hunger) {
            return (hunger / maxHunger * 100).toFixed(2);
        },
        getPlay: function(play) {
            return (play / maxPlay * 100).toFixed(2);
        },
        //find the current 'setting' and return it
        //very useful to make sure that different widgets all know what the game state is
        getSetting: function() {
            return setting;
        },
        //Update the 'setting' and return it (this makes sure that the widget that tried to set it knows that it got set here)
        setSetting: function(state) {
            setting = state;
            return setting;
        },
        //this is a 2-in-1 function.
        //if you pass it a score (i.e. when you are resuming a game) it will store and return it.
        //otherwise it will just return the score
        score: function(resumeScore) {
            if (resumeScore) {
                score = resumeScore;
            }
            return score;
        },
        //same as the score above, but for the Name
        //this comes into play when you have multiple widgets,
        //when resuming the name will get retrieved by 1 widget, but displaied by another
        name: function(resumeName) {
            if (resumeName) {
                kaoName = resumeName;
            }
            return kaoName;
        }
    };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-04 23:00:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>e9472ff497c62d50cca5fce3a253afb7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>kaogotchiServiceExample</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_e9472ff497c62d50cca5fce3a253afb7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-04 23:07:56</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_6b7c5b9697656910cca5fce3a253aff1
sys_update_xml.payload: custom= (maxSleep + (maxSleep / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.sleep = maxSleep + (maxSleep / 100 * 20); } if (tmgch.hunger >= (maxHunger + (maxHunger / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.hunger = maxHunger + (maxHunger / 100 * 20); } if (tmgch.play >= (maxPlay + (maxPlay / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.play = maxPlay + (maxPlay / 100 * 20); } //Max health percentage (for player) if ((tmgch.sleep / maxSleep * 100) > 100) { sleepHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.hunger / maxHunger * 100) > 100) { hungerHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.play / maxPlay * 100) > 100) { playHpCount = 100; } //Show HP on screen sleepHp.innerHTML = sleepHpCount; hungerHp.innerHTML = hungerHpCount; playHp.innerHTML = playHpCount; //Remove HP every tick tmgch.tick(); //Animations //Hunger bar if (hungerHpCount <= 0) { mouth.innerHTML = "_"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 20) { mouth.innerHTML = "0"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 40) { mouth.innerHTML = "O"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 60) { mouth.innerHTML = "o"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 80) { mouth.innerHTML = "-"; } else if (hungerHpCount > 80) { mouth.innerHTML = ""; } //Sleep bar if (sleepHpCount <= 0) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 20) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; mouth.innerHTML = "."; } else if (sleepHpCount < 40) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = " "; eyeRight.innerHTML = " ` "; } else if (sleepHpCount < 60) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 80) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount > 80) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } //Play bar if (playHpCount <= 0) { effectRight.innerHTML = " "; effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 40) { effectRight.innerHTML = "* "; effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = " "; handLeft.innerHTML = " "; } else if (playHpCount < 60) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 80) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 90) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = "/"; handLeft.innerHTML = "\\"; } else if (playHpCount > 90) { effectLeft.innerHTML = ""; effectRight.innerHTML = ""; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } } } };]]>csp_instancefalsekaogotchi_mainfalseKaogotchi Mainfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-03-15 17:29:246b7c5b9697656910cca5fce3a253aff16Kaogotchi Main46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdcsp_widget_6b7c5b9697656910cca5fce3a253aff1admin2023-03-15 20:04:35

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">691e367031216510525c20467718e7d8</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>611e3670ee21651006d032973596a8d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_611e3670ee21651006d032973596a8d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_691e367071216510253a0da6a5b578d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">a91e367052216510401a61f80cacede6</macroponent><name>fetch related catalog items info</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_data_resource_1.compositeDataViews;
    var result = [];
    var filterOutRecords = api.data.look_up_records_1.results.map((element) => {
        return element.sys_id.value;
    });
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (filterOutRecords.indexOf(model.model.sys_id) != -1) {
            if (model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
            result.push(input.items[i]);
        }
    }
    input.items = result;
    api.setState('relatedCatalogItems', input);
    if (input.items.length > 0) {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', false);
    } else {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>691e367071216510253a0da6a5b578d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetch related catalog items info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_691e367071216510253a0da6a5b578d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ad1e36704b216510eff540915694b1d0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Set my task sysId</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,

}) {

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad1e36704b216510eff540915694b1d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set my task sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ad1e36704b216510eff540915694b1d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ed1e3670f52165102e3eed4e928f52d8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Additional Details">211e367035216510310c961f9b37dbd8</macroponent><name>Fetch variables if catalog</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "No additional details at this time.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var data = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
    var finalOutput = [];
    data.forEach(function(element) {
        if (element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue) {
            finalOutput.push({
                'label': element.sc_item_option._reference.item_option_new.displayValue,
                'value': {
                    'type': 'string',
                    'value': element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue
                }
            });
        }
    });
    if (finalOutput != "") {
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    } else {
        var emptylabel = await helpers.translate("No additional details at this time.");
        var emptyvalue = "";
        finalOutput.push({
            'label': emptylabel,
            'value': {
                'type': 'string',
                'value': emptyvalue
            }
        });
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    }

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_5694b98797e1e910cca5fce3a253af21
sys_update_xml.payload: custom= maxSleep) { tmgch.sleep = maxSleep; } }; c.actionEat = function() { tmgch.hunger += day; if (tmgch.hunger >= maxHunger) { tmgch.hunger = maxHunger; } }; c.actionPlay = function() { tmgch.play += day; if (tmgch.play >= maxPlay) { tmgch.play = maxPlay; } }; //Change menu screens c.mainMenu = function() { c.data.settings = 'main'; }; c.settingsMenu = function() { c.data.settings = 'settings'; }; //set difficulty c.setDif = function(level) { if (level == "Hard") { day = maxTotal * 0.01; } else if (level == "Normal") { day = maxTotal * 0.05; } else if (level == "Easy") { day = maxTotal * 0.1; } }; var addPoints = day / 100; c.startGame = function() { //To start a new game open a modal and ask for a name spModal.open({ title: 'Please, enter a name of your tamagotchi:', input: true, value: c.name, buttons: [{ label: ' ${Cancel}', cancel: true }, { label: ' ${OK}', primary: true } ] }).then(function(name) { c.data.name = name; runGame(); }, function() { //if there isn't a name given just return to the menu screen return; }); }; function runGame() { //set the play screen c.data.settings = 'play'; //Start game core(); //keep running the game in a loop coreUpdate = $interval(function() { core(); }, 100); } //Main gameplay function function core() { //make sure we have the current stats from the object sleepHpCount = (tmgch.sleep / maxSleep * 100).toFixed(2); hungerHpCount = (tmgch.hunger / maxHunger * 100).toFixed(2); playHpCount = (tmgch.play / maxPlay * 100).toFixed(2); //Points can increase in fractions, only update the score when points are a whole number if ((points % 1) == 0) { score++; c.data.scoreBar = score; } //add points and round to 2 places points += addPoints; points = Math.round(points * 100) / 100; //If you die stop the loop and display the score if ((playHpCount <= 0) || (sleepHpCount <= 0) || (hungerHpCount <= 0)) { playHpCount = 0; sleepHpCount = 0; hungerHpCount = 0; $interval.cancel(coreUpdate); c.data.score = 'Your score: ' + score; } //do not allow any stat to go above 100% if ((tmgch.sleep / maxSleep * 100) > 100) { sleepHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.hunger / maxHunger * 100) > 100) { hungerHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.play / maxPlay * 100) > 100) { playHpCount = 100; } //Show stats on screen via ng-bind c.data.sleepHp = sleepHpCount; c.data.hungerHp = hungerHpCount; c.data.playHp = playHpCount; //Remove HP every loop tmgch.sleep -= 1; tmgch.hunger -= 3; tmgch.play -= 2; //Animations var mouth; var eyeLeft; var eyeRight; var effectLeft; var effectRight; var handLeft; var handRight; //Hunger bar if (hungerHpCount <= 0) { mouth = "_"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 20) { mouth = "0"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 40) { mouth = "O"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 60) { mouth = "o"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 80) { mouth = "-"; } else if (hungerHpCount >= 80) { mouth = ""; } //Sleep bar if (sleepHpCount <= 0) { eyeLeft = ""; eyeRight = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 20) { eyeLeft = ""; eyeRight = ""; mouth = "."; } else if (sleepHpCount < 40) { eyeLeft = " "; eyeRight = " ` "; } else if (sleepHpCount < 60) { eyeLeft = ""; eyeRight = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 80) { eyeLeft = ""; eyeRight = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount >= 80) { eyeLeft = ""; eyeRight = ""; } //Play bar if (playHpCount <= 0) { effectRight = " "; effectLeft = " "; handRight = ""; handLeft = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 40) { effectRight = "* "; effectLeft = " "; handRight = " "; handLeft = " "; } else if (playHpCount < 60) { effectLeft = " "; effectRight = " "; handRight = ""; handLeft = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 80) { effectLeft = " "; effectRight = " "; handRight = ""; handLeft = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 90) { effectLeft = " "; effectRight = " "; handRight = "/"; handLeft = "\\"; } else if (playHpCount >= 90) { effectLeft = ""; effectRight = ""; handRight = ""; handLeft = ""; } c.data.kaomoji = effectLeft + handLeft + '(' + eyeLeft + mouth + eyeRight + ')' + handRight + effectRight; } };]]>c.the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; text-align: center; sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">e11e3670bb216510fb877450bc2c42db</macroponent><name>handle_tab_filter_click</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: event.payload.selectedFilter,
			facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		},
		false,
    false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d1e3670e3216510ee215a2a3c3291cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_tab_filter_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2d1e3670e3216510ee215a2a3c3291cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">291e3670052165105cd769c70acbe2e2</macroponent><name>Set catalog Imge</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var model = {};
    var input = api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].cat_item._reference;
    var modelData = input.picture.displayValue;
    if (modelData != undefined) {
        model.headerImage = modelData;
        model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
    }
    api.setState('setImage', model);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>a51e3670d5216510b8487917302f15d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set catalog Imge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a51e3670d5216510b8487917302f15d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ed1e36704a216510322f2335243464d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Additional details">691e367021216510de2973da8c5e20d5</macroponent><name>Fetch catalog item details</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "No additional details at this time.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var data = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
    var finalOutput = [];
    data.forEach(function(element) {
        if (element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue) {
            finalOutput.push({
                'label': element.sc_item_option._reference.item_option_new.displayValue,
                'value': {
                    'type': 'string',
                    'value': element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue
                }
            });
        }
    });
    if (finalOutput != "") {
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    } else {
        var emptylabel = await helpers.translate("No additional details at this time.");
        var emptyvalue = "";
        finalOutput.push({
            'label': emptylabel,
            'value': {
                'type': 'string',
                'value': emptyvalue
            }
        });
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed1e36704a216510322f2335243464d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ed1e36704a216510322f2335243464d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_167c9b9697656910cca5fce3a253afb5
sys_update_xml.payload: custom= (maxSleep + (maxSleep / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.sleep = maxSleep + (maxSleep / 100 * 20); } if (tmgch.hunger >= (maxHunger + (maxHunger / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.hunger = maxHunger + (maxHunger / 100 * 20); } if (tmgch.play >= (maxPlay + (maxPlay / 100 * 20))) { tmgch.play = maxPlay + (maxPlay / 100 * 20); } //Max health percentage (for player) if ((tmgch.sleep / maxSleep * 100) > 100) { sleepHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.hunger / maxHunger * 100) > 100) { hungerHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.play / maxPlay * 100) > 100) { playHpCount = 100; } //Show HP on screen sleepHp.innerHTML = sleepHpCount; hungerHp.innerHTML = hungerHpCount; playHp.innerHTML = playHpCount; //Remove HP every tick tmgch.tick(); //Animations //Hunger bar if (hungerHpCount <= 0) { mouth.innerHTML = "_"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 20) { mouth.innerHTML = "0"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 40) { mouth.innerHTML = "O"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 60) { mouth.innerHTML = "o"; } else if (hungerHpCount < 80) { mouth.innerHTML = "-"; } else if (hungerHpCount > 80) { mouth.innerHTML = ""; } //Sleep bar if (sleepHpCount <= 0) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 20) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; mouth.innerHTML = "."; } else if (sleepHpCount < 40) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = " "; eyeRight.innerHTML = " ` "; } else if (sleepHpCount < 60) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount < 80) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } else if (sleepHpCount > 80) { eyeLeft.innerHTML = ""; eyeRight.innerHTML = ""; } //Play bar if (playHpCount <= 0) { effectRight.innerHTML = " "; effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 40) { effectRight.innerHTML = "* "; effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = " "; handLeft.innerHTML = " "; } else if (playHpCount < 60) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 80) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } else if (playHpCount < 90) { effectLeft.innerHTML = " "; effectRight.innerHTML = " "; handRight.innerHTML = "/"; handLeft.innerHTML = "\\"; } else if (playHpCount > 90) { effectLeft.innerHTML = ""; effectRight.innerHTML = ""; handRight.innerHTML = ""; handLeft.innerHTML = ""; } } } };]]>csp_instancefalsekaogotchi_buttonsfalseKaogotchi Buttonsfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-03-15 17:29:09167c9b9697656910cca5fce3a253afb55Kaogotchi Buttons46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdcsp_widget_167c9b9697656910cca5fce3a253afb5admin2023-03-15 20:00:48

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_b0046b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253af29
sys_update_xml.payload: customc .the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; text-align: center; border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block; } h1, h2 { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } #t-body { font-size: 70px; } #name { display: inline-block; margin-bottom: 50px; color: #fff; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 30px; background-color: #131313; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } .menu-buttons a:hover { background-color: #131313; color: #fafafa; } .menu-buttons { width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; font-size: 30px; width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp span { font-weight: 500; } .hp p { display: inline; font-size: 20px; display: block; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; }sp_instanceUsed in CCL1256-K23.falsekaogotchi_ex2_widgetfalseKaogotchi ex2 Widgettruefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-04-04 22:42:36b0046b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253af297Kaogotchi ex2 Widget46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdcsp_widget_b0046b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253af29admin2023-04-24 19:33:11

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_291e3670c6216510b821a8c9c0c5b5d0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">691e3670d1216510620f023dad3d97e4</macroponent><name>display_value_block_1_items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**

* @param {params} params

* @param {api} params.api

* @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers

*/

function evaluateProperty({

    api,

    helpers

}) {

    var modelArray = [];

    var modelData = api.data.look_up_record_1.result;

    var table = api.state.table;

    var user = api.context.session.user.fullName;

    var requestedFor = api.data.look_up_record_3.result.requested_for.displayValue;



    function block(label, type, value) {

        var out = {};

        var labelNew = helpers.translateSync("{0}", label);

        out.label = labelNew;

        var outval = {};

        outval.type = type;

        outval.value = value;

        out.value = outval;

        return out;

    }



    function getDate(item) {

        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {

            var itemDate = new Date(item.displayValue);

            item.displayValue = [itemDate.getFullYear(), itemDate.getMonth() + 1, itemDate.getDate()].join('-');;

            return item;

        }

    }



    function addToModel(item, label) {



        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {

            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));

        }

    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {

            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));

        }

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");

        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");

        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};

        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {

            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));

        }

        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");

    } else if (table === 'incident') {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");

        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");

        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");

        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");

    } else {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

    }



    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");

    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");

    return modelArray;

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>291e3670c6216510b821a8c9c0c5b5d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>display_value_block_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_291e3670c6216510b821a8c9c0c5b5d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">a91e367052216510401a61f80cacede6</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>a11e3670a52165105d2e07e0f51a43d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a11e3670a52165105d2e07e0f51a43d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_e91e36702a216510cb8a0d296266e9dc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>e91e36702a216510cb8a0d296266e9dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e91e36702a216510cb8a0d296266e9dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_86a32b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253afd5
sys_update_xml.payload: customc .the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; text-align: center; border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block; } h1, h2 { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } #t-body { font-size: 70px; } #name { display: inline-block; margin-bottom: 50px; color: #fff; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 30px; background-color: #131313; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } .menu-buttons a:hover { background-color: #131313; color: #fafafa; } .menu-buttons { width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; font-size: 30px; width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp span { font-weight: 500; } .hp p { display: inline; font-size: 20px; display: block; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; }sp_instanceUsed in CCL1256-K23.falsekaogotchi_ex1_widgetfalseKaogotchi ex1 Widgettruefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-04-04 22:41:0286a32b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253afd59Kaogotchi ex1 Widget46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdcsp_widget_86a32b3497c62d50cca5fce3a253afd5admin2023-04-24 19:31:22

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">e11e3670bb216510fb877450bc2c42db</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>251e3670d5216510ff93db243754a1d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_251e3670d5216510ff93db243754a1d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Security & sign-in">e51e3670cc2165106536ad8cb568dad4</macroponent><name>Checking MFA setup</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var modelData = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
    var mfa = {};
    if (modelData == "false") {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', true);
    } else {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', false);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>e11e36702d2165101b96d737ac4c3ad5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Checking MFA setup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e11e36702d2165101b96d737ac4c3ad5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_e51e3670422165102abc6e896c75fed1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">e11e3670bb216510fb877450bc2c42db</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>e51e3670422165102abc6e896c75fed1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e51e3670422165102abc6e896c75fed1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:34</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

}) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">e11e3670bb216510fb877450bc2c42db</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>a51e367089216510b4a1e1d4e9a38ddb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a51e367089216510b4a1e1d4e9a38ddb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_291e3670b62165100028a72c588437d6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Fetch my tasks</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval overdue: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval Request: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval due: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const input = api.data.evam_mytasks.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        var currDate = new Date();
        var dueDate = new Date(model.model.due_date);
        if (model.model.due_date != "") {
            model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Approval due: {0}", dueDate);
            if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel =await helpers.translate("Approval overdue: {0}", dueDate);
            }
        }
        model.title = await helpers.translate("Approval Request: {0}", model.title);
        if (model.model.table == "sc_req_item") {
            if (model.model.recurring_frequency != "") {
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
            }
        }
        if (model.model.sys_created_on != "") {
            var createdDate = new Date(model.model.sys_created_on);
            model.detailValueOne = [createdDate.getFullYear(), createdDate.getMonth() + 1, createdDate.getDate()].join('-');
        }
    }
    api.setState('mytaskData', input);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>291e3670b62165100028a72c588437d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch my tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_291e3670b62165100028a72c588437d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">691e367070216510a7fc1c6c73909fe1</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>a11e367066216510724d37f2d7b022d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a11e367066216510724d37f2d7b022d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_e91e3670162165102db416f6786abdd6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">651e36703d2165103de69c93cc89e0dc</macroponent><name>Show Delete Comment Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment deleted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }

} //Show stats on screen via ng-bind c.data.sleepHp = sleepHpCount; c.data.hungerHp = hungerHpCount; c.data.playHp = playHpCount; //Remove HP every loop tmgch.sleep -= 1; tmgch.hunger -= 3; tmgch.play -= 2; //update the server record to match the new values c.data.action = "updateKao"; c.data.tmgch = tmgch; c.server.update().then(function() { c.data.action = undefined; }); } };]]>c .the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; text-align: center; border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block; } h1, h2 { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } #t-body { font-size: 70px; } #name { display: inline-block; margin-bottom: 50px; color: #fff; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 30px; background-color: #131313; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-size: 30px; width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp span { font-weight: 500; } .hp p { display: inline; font-size: 20px; display: block; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; }sp_instanceMisc. example widget created during development of this lab. sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_651e36709021651074da0fe61da420d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>651e36709021651074da0fe61da420d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_651e36709021651074da0fe61da420d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">a91e367052216510401a61f80cacede6</macroponent><name>Order success redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        payload: params
    } = event;
    const route = "order_success";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d1e36700f216510b2e08bf2c7f8f5d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order success redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6d1e36700f216510b2e08bf2c7f8f5d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ad1e3670d8216510b89c26ab50ee87d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Tasks">251e3670a9216510d654a96187235eda</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_2') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.context.props.approvalId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_1') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.context.props.approvalId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad1e3670d8216510b89c26ab50ee87d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ad1e3670d8216510b89c26ab50ee87d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: custom 100) { sleepHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.hunger / c.kaoServ.maxHunger * 100) > 100) { hungerHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.play / c.kaoServ.maxPlay * 100) > 100) { playHpCount = 100; } //Show stats on screen via ng-bind c.data.sleepHp = sleepHpCount; c.data.hungerHp = hungerHpCount; c.data.playHp = playHpCount; //Remove HP every loop tmgch.sleep -= 1; tmgch.hunger -= 3; tmgch.play -= 2; c.data.scoreBar = c.kaoServ.score(); //update the server record to match the new values c.data.action = "updateKao"; c.data.tmgch = tmgch; c.server.update().then(function() { c.data.action = undefined; }); } };]]>c.the-box { width: 100%; text-align: center; border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } .menu-buttons a:hover { background-color: #131313; color: #fafafa; } .menu-buttons { width: 100%; text-align: center; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; }sp_instanceUsed in CCL1256-K23.falsekaogotchi_v3_controlsfalseKaogotchi Controlstruefalsesp_widgetadmin2023-03-29 21:21:0664d7540797f9a550cca5fce3a253af6f26Kaogotchi Controls46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdcsp_widget_64d7540797f9a550cca5fce3a253af6fadmin2023-04-04 23:18:05

}) {

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_611e3670c3216510c674713be26654d4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Fetch my requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Completion date: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_myrequests.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        var currDate = new Date();
        var dueDate = new Date(model.model.due_date);
        const duedateLabel = [dueDate.getFullYear(), dueDate.getMonth() + 1, dueDate.getDate()].join('-');
        var price = model.model.price;
        if (model.model.table == "sc_req_item") {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
            if (model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
            if (price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null)
                model.subtitle = " ";
        } else {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
        }
    }
    api.setState('requestData', input);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>611e3670c3216510c674713be26654d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch my requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_611e3670c3216510c674713be26654d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_a91e3670ba216510e8ef964af334fbd7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>a91e3670ba216510e8ef964af334fbd7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a91e3670ba216510e8ef964af334fbd7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:33</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: customc.the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; } .outside-box { border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block;} h1, h2 { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } #t-body { font-size: 70px; } #name { display: inline-block; margin-bottom: 50px; color: #fff; padding: 5px 10px; font-size: 30px; background-color: #131313; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 500; } .menu-buttons a:hover { background-color: #131313; color: #fafafa; } .menu-buttons { width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp { font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; font-weight: 300; font-size: 30px; width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hp span { font-weight: 500; } .hp p { display: inline; font-size: 20px; display: block; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; } .menu { text-align: center; }sp_instanceUsed in CCL1256-K23.truekaogotchi_landingfalseKaogotchi Landingtrue

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_291e36706921651065ee93c72f3df6d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">e11e36709c2165105372696f978733e7</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_6') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskApproveSysId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_8') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskRejectedSysId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    }
    helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
        api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    }, 500);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>291e36706921651065ee93c72f3df6d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_291e36706921651065ee93c72f3df6d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:32</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">291e3670052165105cd769c70acbe2e2</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**

 * @param {any} params.event

function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const route = "landing";

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>e51e3670fa21651055951b28163bdeda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Kaogotchi" source="x_snc_kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kaogotchi">46c021e997fc6910cca5fce3a253afdc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e51e3670fa21651055951b28163bdeda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 23:25:35</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_84979a4697312550cca5fce3a253af57
sys_update_xml.payload: custom 100) { sleepHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.hunger / c.kaoServ.maxHunger * 100) > 100) { hungerHpCount = 100; } if ((tmgch.play / c.kaoServ.maxPlay * 100) > 100) { playHpCount = 100; } //Show stats on screen via ng-bind c.data.sleepHp = sleepHpCount; c.data.hungerHp = hungerHpCount; c.data.playHp = playHpCount; //Remove HP every loop tmgch.sleep -= 1; tmgch.hunger -= 3; tmgch.play -= 2; //update the server record to match the new values c.data.action = "updateKao"; c.data.tmgch = tmgch; c.server.update().then(function() { c.data.action = undefined; }); } };]]>c.the-box { margin-top: 15%; width: 100%; text-align: center; border: 6px dashed #d9d9d9; border-radius: 24px 24px 24px 24px; padding: 10px; display: inline-block; } h3 { margin-top: 20px; } .btn{ display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; border: 2px solid #131313; padding: 10px 20px; margin: 20px 20px 0px 20px; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; font-weight: 300; font-family: menlo, consolas, monotype, monospace; } .btn-primary { background-color: #208476; } .btn-primary:active:focus { background-color: #032D42; } .settings-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } .menu-buttons { margin-top: 50px; } /*GAME SCREEN*/ .tamagotchi { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; font-size: 80px; text-align: center; } .menu-buttons a:hover { background-color: #131313; color: #fafafa; } .menu-buttons { width: 100%; text-align: center; } .btn a { font-size: 20px; margin: 20px 2px 0px 2px; }sp_instanceMisc. example widget created during development of this lab.
